plot: A cattleman's son stops his men from busting up a herd of sheep when he sees that they're owned by a pretty young woman.
title: Sundown Trail
plot_es: A cattleman's son stops his men from busting up a herd of sheep when he sees that they're owned by a pretty young woman.
plot_en: A cattleman's son stops his men from busting up a herd of sheep when he sees that they're owned by a pretty young woman.
